titles.title: Would You Be Poured Out As Wine Upon The Altar For Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Would you be poured out as wine upon the altar for me?
Would you be broken as bread to feed the hungry?
Would you be so one with Me that I may do just as I will?
To make thee light and love and life: My word fulfilled.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tendrás que ser derramado como vino,
En el altar por mí
Tendrás que ser desmoronado como pan
Para los hambrientos
Tendrás que ser tan unido a mí
Que pueda hablarte como quiero
Para ser de luz, amor y vida
Mi palabra cumplida.
